parametrized_description: At least MinLocals locals must be transported across a lake using kayaks and motorboats. Kayaks can transport KayakCapacity people per trip and take KayakTime minutes per trip, while motorboats can transport MotorboatCapacity people per trip and take MotorboatTime minutes per trip. The number of motorboat trips is limited to at most MaxMotorboatTrips, and at least MinKayakTripPercentage of the total trips must be by kayak. The objective is to minimize the total transportation time.

MinLocals.description: Minimum number of locals to transport

KayakCapacity.description: Number of people a kayak can transport per trip

MotorboatCapacity.description: Number of people a motorboat can transport per trip

KayakTime.description: Time in minutes a kayak takes per trip

MotorboatTime.description: Time in minutes a motorboat takes per trip

MaxMotorboatTrips.description: Maximum number of motorboat trips allowed

MinKayakTripPercentage.description: Minimum percentage of trips that must be by kayak

constraints.description: Ensure that at least MinLocals individuals are transported across the lake using kayaks and motorboats.
The number of motorboat trips must not exceed MaxMotorboatTrips.
At least MinKayakTripPercentage of the total trips must be conducted by kayak.

objective.description: Minimize the total transportation time, which is the sum of the time taken by all kayak trips and motorboat trips.
